content:
Just saw these messages from a Drupal work colleague in Slack:

I encountered a strange behaviour of Drupal in terms of images upload
After uploading a minified image (which is a background image, but placed as an img element) Drupal increases its size :open_mouth:
From 200KB to 2MB — what the hell?
There is no upscaling enabled in the image styles settings
It looks like Drupal recompress the images not only reducing their weight and quality, but also works the other way around and tries to restore the form of already compressed images :open_mouth:
I didn’t expect that

Does Backdrop have this issue too?
Side discussion, what has come of promoting imagemagick as the default with fallback to GD?
